name: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerOptions
desc: An object that customizes how a store description aligns with a CloudKit database.

items.name: init(containerIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Initializes container options using the given CloudKit container identifier.

items.name: var containerIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier of the CloudKit container associated with a given store description.

items.name: var databaseScope: CKDatabase.Scope
items.desc: The database scope — public, private, or shared — to use for a specified store in a persistent CloudKit container.
